page.title: 02RUISLIP HOUSING IN GENERAL
page.content: Eastcote is a middle class residential area, there are a variety of house types but the majority appears to be 1930's semi-detached and detached houses. They are well spaced out and are well maintained with fairly large well kept gardens. Many have extensions. The majority of people are owner occupiers and there is little rented accomodation. A cross section of properties for sale were obtained from local estate agents and prices were found to be in the range of Â£40 000/ Â£100 000. Ruislip is very similar with three high class roads: Sherwood Avenue, Broadwood Avenue and Park Avenue where the prices range from 100 000 to over 200 000 pounds. There are a few council houses in Ruislip. These have 2 or 3 bedrooms but some have 5 or 6. There are also some flats in Ruislip.
